des1checkmotion.description: Make sure your room is not dark and that it have enough light.
des1checkmotion.message: Make sure your room is not dark and that it have enough light.

des2checkmotion.description: Your camera must not receive direct sunlight.
des2checkmotion.message: Your camera must not receive direct sunlight.

desalllightsoff.description: Kliknutím na tlačidlo lampa bude prepínať svetlá zapnuté/vypnuté na všetkých otvorených záložiek keď je táto voľba zapnutá.
